Posts.Content: Hi, just been diagnosed, waiting for surgery date for double mastectomy, struggling with this limbo, husband left a week before mamagramme, now he wants to help, guess you can imagine how mixed up I am, thanks for reading.
Posts.Title: newly diagnosed with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen, I know I need this time to prepare but can't seem to think straight, hopefully things will fall into place, hope you're ok.
Posts.Title: newly diagnosed with breast cancer
